author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: WTF | Watch: This 'Scream' parody accurately depicts the nightmare that is picking a movie on Netflix
text:
Let's be honest, the 'chill' in Netflix and chill does not exist. Especially when you haven't decided what you're watching yet.
When in doubt, Aziz Ansari is always a safe option (and there's so many options you'll always be able to find one you haven't seen yet).
Via YouTube
